item.title: 特鲁多的移民计划取决于数百万人的离开
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理解决加拿大移民问题的计划取决于至少自 20 世纪 40 年代以来最大规模的人口外流；许多经济学家怀疑这一计划是否可行。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s plan to fix immigration in Canada depends on the biggest exodus of people since at least the 1940s — one that many economists doubt is feasible.】

item.title: 特朗普财政部长人选将与共和党参议员会面，议程包括美联储和关税问题
item.description: 即将上任的参议院共和党领袖约翰-图恩（John Thune）表示，他希望在提名听证会之前讨论财政部长提名人斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）对关税和美联储的看法。【原文：Incoming Senate Republican leader John Thune said he expects to discuss Treasury secretary nominee Scott Bessent’s views on tariffs and the Federal Reserve ahead of nomination hearings.】

item.title: 研究发现，特朗普过去的关税政策损害了美国经济和股市
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行最新发布的研究报告，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普第一任期内对中国征收的关税对美国经济产生了负面影响。【原文：Tariffs imposed on China during President-elect Donald Trump’s first term had negative effects for the US economy, according to newly released research from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 出售给贝莱德后，HPS 为留住员工提供激励措施
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一封投资者信，HPS Investment Partners 将向员工提供五年内归属的补助金，以鼓励他们在被贝莱德收购后继续留任。【原文：HPS Investment Partners is offering employees grants that vest over five years to encourage them to stay on after being acquired by BlackRock, according to an investor letter seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官认为马斯克不会利用政治力量对付对手
item.description: OpenAI首席执行官萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）驳斥了竞争对手埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）可能利用其新发现的政治影响力削弱竞争对手并为自己的人工智能努力谋利的担忧。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman dismissed concerns that rival Elon Musk might use his newfound political influence to undercut competitors and benefit his own artificial intelligence efforts.】

item.title: 南非农场游说团在经历震荡下滑后开始审查农业数据
item.description: 南非最大的农场产业机构已委托对其数据进行审查，因为官方统计数据显示，农业部门的衰退程度远远超出了该机构的预期。【原文：South Africa’s largest farm-industry body has commissioned a review of its data after official statistics showed a much deeper slump in the agriculture sector than it had foreseen.】

item.title: 官员称肯尼亚可通过侨民债券筹资 38.6 亿美元
item.description: 肯尼亚一位高级官员表示，肯尼亚正在与世界银行的一个部门合作，通过发行侨民债券筹集多达 5000 亿先令（38.6 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Kenya is working with a World Bank unit to raise as much as 500 billion shillings ($3.86 billion) by issuing a diaspora bond, a top official said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔发表讲话前服务业指数疲软止住债券跌势
item.description: 美国服务业活动指数弱于预期，令美联储将在本月降息的押注升温，美国国债抛售陷入停滞。【原文：A selloff in US Treasuries stalled after a weaker-than-expected gauge of service-sector activity boosted bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates this month.】

item.title: Makhlouf 称地缘政治风险增加对爱尔兰不利
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行行长周三表示，爱尔兰面临的地缘政治风险过大，并指出对国内经济至关重要的跨国公司数量过多。【原文：Ireland is disproportionately exposed to increased geopolitical risks, the Central Bank governor said Wednesday, pointing to the outsized number of multinational companies that are central to the domestic economy.】

item.title: 英国关闭转移寡头数十亿美元的俄罗斯加密货币网络
item.description: 英国警方表示，他们已经关闭了俄罗斯的网络，这些网络通过在欧洲、中东和南美将现金换成加密货币，为寡头、街头帮派和间谍转移了数十亿美元。【原文：UK police said they have shut down Russian networks that were moving billions of dollars for oligarchs, street gangs and spies by swapping cash for cryptocurrency across Europe, the Middle East and South America.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称欧盟共同融资 "可取
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，她赞成欧盟为安全和气候转型等共同利益联合融资。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said she favors joint European Union financing for common goods such as security and climate transition.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动增速为三个月来最慢
item.description: 随着需求和就业增长的回落，11 月份美国服务业活动的扩张速度为三个月来最慢，这表明经济的最大组成部分正在失去动力。【原文：US services activity expanded in November at the slowest pace in three months as demand and employment growth settled back, indicating the largest part of the economy is losing momentum.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚人期待经济疲软和政治腐败加剧
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，哥伦比亚人对经济和政治阶层的可信度越来越感到悲观。【原文：Colombians are increasingly gloomy about both the economy and the trustworthiness of their political class, a new poll found.】

item.title: 物价上涨压倒经济强劲 卢拉支持率下降
item.description: 在巴西经济保持强劲的情况下，总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦的支持率却在下降，这凸显了在他进入任期后半段时，物价上涨和他本人的支出政策所带来的风险。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s approval is declining even as Brazil’s economy remains strong, highlighting the risks rising prices and his own spending policies pose as he enters the second half of his term.】

item.title: 交易失败后，教练车所有者启动债券销售以偿还贷款
item.description: Coach 和 Kate Spade 品牌的所有者 Tapestry 公司在被迫放弃收购 Capri 控股有限公司（Capri Holdings Ltd. ）之后，周三首次进入投资级债券市场。【原文：The owner of Coach and Kate Spade brands, Tapestry Inc., is tapping the investment-grade bond market Wednesday, for the first time after being forced to abandon its acquisition of Capri Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 匈牙利寻求美国豁免通过俄罗斯天然气公司支付天然气费用
item.description: 匈牙利要求美国豁免最近的制裁，以便它可以继续使用俄罗斯天然气工业银行向俄罗斯支付天然气运输费用。【原文：Hungary asked the US for a waiver from recent sanctions so it can continue paying Russia for natural gas deliveries using Gazprombank.】

item.title: 德国工业公司 Pfisterer 据称酝酿法兰克福上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国高压电缆绝缘子制造商 Pfisterer Holding SE 正在考虑明年在法兰克福进行首次公开募股。【原文：Pfisterer Holding SE, a German manufacturer of high-voltage cable insulators, is considering an initial public offering in Frankfurt next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金丝雀码头新债获得债券持有人绿灯
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，金丝雀码头集团的债券持有人已同意让这家伦敦码头区开发商举借新债，为其约 6 亿英镑（7.6 亿美元）的到期票据再融资铺平道路。【原文：Canary Wharf Group’s bondholders have agreed to let the London docklands developer raise new debt, according to a regulatory filing, paving the way for it to refinance around £600 million ($760 million) of maturing notes.】

item.title: Salesforce 斥资 3.44 亿美元收购 Zoomin 初创公司
item.description: 上个月，Salesforce 公司斥资 3.44 亿美元收购了数据管理初创公司 Zoomin Software Ltd.，这笔交易的金额此前未曾披露，凸显了该公司新的交易方式。【原文：Salesforce Inc. spent $344 million to buy data management startup Zoomin Software Ltd. last month, a previously undisclosed sum that underscores the company’s new approach to dealmaking.】

item.title: 调查显示：特朗普新任期中期石油价格将跌破 60 美元
item.description: 据海恩斯博恩律师事务所（Haynes Boone LLP）的一项调查显示，银行正在为美国油价在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的新任期中期跌破每桶 60 美元做准备。【原文：Banks are gearing up for US oil prices to fall below $60 a barrel by the middle of President-elect Donald Trump’s new term in office, according to a survey from law firm Haynes Boone LLP.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德认为经济增长疲软且前景不确定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）警告说，近期内经济可能依然脆弱，不确定性和下行风险将给经济前景蒙上阴影。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde warned that the economy is likely to remain fragile in the near term, with uncertainty and downside risks clouding the outlook beyond that.】

item.title: 美联储主席穆萨莱姆表示，放缓或暂停降息的时机可能已经到来
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，在通胀率高于预期、对劳动力市场的担忧下降的情况下，现在可能是决策者放慢降息步伐的时候了。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said it may be time for policymakers to slow the pace of interest-rate cuts amid higher than desired inflation and declining concerns over the labor market.】

item.title: 李斯特菌病悲剧发生后，所有金牌制造商老虎品牌翻过了新的一页
item.description: 老虎品牌有限公司（Tiger Brands Ltd.）股价攀升至五年半来的最高水平，表明投资者对首席执行官 Tjaart Kruger 的领导能力越来越有信心。【原文：Tiger Brands Ltd. shares climbed to their highest levels in five and a half years, signaling growing investor confidence in the leadership of Chief Executive Officer Tjaart Kruger, who took the helm 13 months ago to turn around South Africa’s largest food producer.】

item.title: 道达尔能源同意以 15.7 亿欧元收购可再生能源公司 VSB
item.description: 道达尔能源 SE 同意以 15.7 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的价格从私募股权公司 Partners Group Holding AG 手中收购德国可再生能源项目开发商 VSB 集团。【原文：TotalEnergies SE agreed to buy German renewable project developer VSB Group from private equity firm Partners Group Holding AG for €1.57 billion ($1.6 billion).】

item.title: 劳伦森寻求合作伙伴为 10 亿美元的 Northpoint 资产提供资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大劳伦森银行（Laurentian Bank of Canada）正在与包括私人信贷公司在内的资产管理公司洽谈，为其设备融资提供商 Northpoint Commercial Finance 筹集约 10 亿美元的资产。【原文：Laurentian Bank of Canada is in talks with asset managers including private credit firms to fund around $1 billion of assets for its equipment finance provider, Northpoint Commercial Finance, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示，11 月美国公司新增就业岗位 14.6 万个
item.description: 11 月份，美国公司的就业人数保持稳定，进一步证明劳动力市场虽然放缓，但仍具有活力。【原文：Employment at US companies remained firm in November, adding to evidence of a slowing but resilient labor market.】

item.title: 埃克萨罗公司首席执行官停职，等待工作场所行为调查
item.description: 南非煤炭生产商埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）首席执行官 Nombasa Tsengwa 已被预防性停职，直至对其行为指控的调查结束。【原文：South African coal producer Exxaro Resources Ltd. has placed Chief Executive Officer Nombasa Tsengwa on precautionary suspension until an investigation into allegations over her conduct is concluded.】

item.title: 迈向 2025 年的主要矛盾
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贝莱德的新合约要求芬克留住关键人才
item.description: 拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）在一年的时间里投入了约 250 亿美元，将贝莱德公司打造成基础设施和私人信贷领域的前五大公司。现在，他正集中精力吸引公司最新的雨露均沾者留在公司。【原文：Larry Fink is shelling out about $25 billion in the space of a year to turn BlackRock Inc. into a top-five player in infrastructure and private credit. Now he’s focused on enticing the firm’s newest rainmakers to stay on board.】

item.title: Springboks 所有者告诉立法者私人股权交易是生存的关键
item.description: 负责监管卫冕橄榄球联盟世界冠军南非春季队的机构告诉立法者，如果不增加收入，它将面临倒闭的风险。【原文：The body that oversees the reigning rugby-union world champions, South Africa’s Springboks, told lawmakers it faces the risk of collapse if it doesn’t boost revenue.】
